snippet: John Malkovich, who played the Vicomte de Valmont in Stephen Frears’s 1988 film version of “Dangerous Liaisons,” will have his French-language production of the play presented by Shakespeare Theater Company.
abstract: John Malkovich, who played the Vicomte de Valmont in Stephen Frears’s 1988 film version of “Dangerous Liaisons,” will have his French-language production of the play presented by Shakespeare Theater Company.

headline.main: Malkovich to Direct a Modernized 'Dangerous Liaisons' in Washington
